inscription.text: (From left top) 1.Hema (Hindi text) 2. Cardboard Safety Matches (back of a matchbox) 3. Pratap 4. Back of Pratap 5. Battak ( text in Hindi) (Duck) 6. Deluxe Cardboard Matches 7. White Horse-Silver Jubilee Product 8. Saghan Kshetra Vikas, Rajsamand (Rajasthan). (back of number seven) 9. Wilson -Damp Proof 10.The One Strike Light. With built- in safety. Karborized to go off in one puff. No glowing tips. Total safety against fire hazards. Ballard Estates. Bombay. 11. Three Diamonds, Ananth Match Works (Back of no. 12) 12. Three Diamonds. Card Board Safety Matches 13.Balak (child) Safety Matches 14. (Back of some match). Prabakaran Match Works, Sindhalakkaral. 15. Duck (Battak-text in Hindi) 16. Vijay 17. Empty 18. Good Flake @artist=Collector : Abhishek Khandelwal

location.name: Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art
Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art

rights.text: Copyrighted. Copyright with the original artists and publishers.
